data.name: Tigra
data.description: Protector of the Cat People, Tigra ferociously defends her allies and uses her razor-sharp claws to rend her opponents.

starItems.name: Tigra
starItems.description: Protector of the Cat People, Tigra ferociously defends her allies and uses her razor-sharp claws to rend her opponents.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> Piercing.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to secondary target

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
If any target already had <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to that target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

If any target already had <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to that target.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
If any target already had <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, apply an additional <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to that target

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

If any target already had <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, apply an additional <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to that target.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

If any target already had <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, apply an additional <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to that target.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

If any target already had <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, apply an additional <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to that target.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> Piercing.

Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> Piercing.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Gain <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > This attack cannot be counterattacked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>280%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.
 > This attack cannot be counterattacked.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all enemies

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply an additional <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Apply an additional <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.
 > This attack cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Apply an additional <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
 > This attack cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>450%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Apply an additional <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
 > This attack cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
Clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> on all enemies
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to all enemies

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>500%</color> damage. Clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> on each target and apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to all enemies.
 > Apply an additional <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
 > This attack cannot be blocked.

1.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and <color=#86e619>1</color> random adjacent <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally.
On Dodge, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>3%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade:
<color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>

2.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and <color=#86e619>1</color> random adjacent <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally.
On Dodge, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>3%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.

3.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and <color=#86e619>1</color> random adjacent <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally.
On Dodge, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>3%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
3.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Spawn, apply +<color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>

4.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and <color=#86e619>1</color> random adjacent <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally.
On Dodge, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>3%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.<color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
 > On Spawn, apply +<color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to self and  all <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, lower Damage Reduction by <color=#86e619>25%</color> for all enemies with <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, lower Resistance by <color=#86e619>50%</color> for all enemies with <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>

5.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and <color=#86e619>1</color> random adjacent <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally.
On Dodge, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>3%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
 > On Spawn, apply +<color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to self and  all <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies.
 > Lower Damage Reduction by <color=#86e619>25%</color> for all enemies with <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
 > Lower Resistance by <color=#86e619>50%</color> for all enemies with <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
